short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and download images, video and audio on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download media from any website. You can download images, videos and audio.

* Dark theme available
* Added Media Downloader to context menu
* Display media from all visited tabs
* Remember media when changing tab
* Remember media when changing URL in tab
